name: Personal Inquiry Manager for Android
tagline: Android source code of the Personal Inquiry Manager (PIM) that support mobile Inquiry Based Learning activities
body:
### About

The weSPOT consortium has build a Personal Inquiry Manager available on main mobile platforms (iOS, Android) as free apps supporting learnerâ€™s in a self-directed approach for creating personal inquiry projects on mobiles as also managing there existing on-going inquiry projects. The personal inquiry manager will also be the central Hub for personal badges and mobile profile access and networking.

![](https://www.dropbox.com/s/ixwgoseo79qe1xl/wespot_mobile_data_collection_graffle__Canvas_2.png?dl=0)

Visit our [wiki](https://github.com/weSPOT/pim_android/wiki) for more information
